## Quaternion.RotationAlphaBetaGamma() method

Creates a new quaternion from the given Euler float angles expressed in z-x-z orientation

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static RotationAlphaBetaGamma(alpha: number, beta: number, gamma: number): Quaternion;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  alpha | <code>number</code> | defines the rotation around first axis |
|  beta | <code>number</code> | defines the rotation around second axis |
|  gamma | <code>number</code> | defines the rotation around third axis |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Quaternion`

the new quaternion
